title: trafficSSL
extract: SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is the standard security technology for establishing an encrypted link between a web server and a browser. This link ensures that all data passed between the web server and browsers remain private and integral. ... Your web server will match your issued SSL Certificate to your Private Key.
extract_html: SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is the standard security technology for establishing an encrypted link between a web server and a browser. This link ensures that all data passed between the web server and browsers remain private and integral. ... Your web server will match your issued SSL Certificate to your Private Key.
